properties.name: operation
properties.description: Create a stream

options.name: Create
options.description: Create a stream

options.name: Delete
options.description: Delete a stream

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Get many streams

options.name: Get Subscribed
options.description: Get subscribed streams

options.name: Update
options.description: Update a stream

properties.name: additionalFieldsJson
properties.description: JSON format parameters for stream creation

properties.name: subscriptions
properties.description: A list of dictionaries containing the the key name and value specifying the name of the stream to subscribe. If the stream does not exist a new stream is created.

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: If announce is True and one of the streams specified in subscriptions has to be created (i.e. doesnt exist to begin with), an announcement will be made notifying that a new stream was created.

options.name: announce
options.description: If announce is True and one of the streams specified in subscriptions has to be created (i.e. doesnt exist to begin with), an announcement will be made notifying that a new stream was created.

options.name: authorizationErrorsFatal
options.description: Whether authorization errors (such as when the requesting user is not authorized to access a private stream) should be considered fatal or not. When True, an authorization error is reported as such. When set to False, the returned JSON payload indicates that there was an authorization error, but the response is still considered a successful one.

options.name: historyPublicToSubscribers
options.description: Whether the streams message history should be available to newly subscribed members, or users can only access messages they actually received while subscribed to the stream

options.name: inviteOnly
options.description: Whether the streams specified in subscriptions are invite-only or not

options.name: principals
options.description: A list of email addresses of the users that will be subscribed/unsubscribed to the streams specified in the subscriptions argument. If not provided, then the requesting user/bot is subscribed.

options.name: streamPostPolicy
options.description: Policy for which users can post messages to the stream
Any user can post
Only administrators can post
Only new members can post

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: Whether to include all active streams. The user must have administrative privileges to use this parameter.

options.name: includeAllActive
options.description: Whether to include all active streams. The user must have administrative privileges to use this parameter.

options.name: includeDefault
options.description: Whether to include all default streams for the users realm

options.name: includeOwnersubscribed
options.description: Whether the user is a bot, include all streams that the bots owner is subscribed to

options.name: includePublic
options.description: Whether to include all public streams

options.name: includeSubscribed
options.description: Whether to include all streams that the user is subscribed to

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: Whether each returned stream object should include a subscribers field containing a list of the user IDs of its subscribers

options.name: includeSubscribers
options.description: Whether each returned stream object should include a subscribers field containing a list of the user IDs of its subscribers

properties.name: streamId
properties.description: ID of stream to update

properties.name: additionalFieldsJson
properties.description: JSON format parameters for stream creation

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: Whether the stream is limited to announcements

options.name: isAnnouncementOnly
options.description: Whether the stream is limited to announcements

options.name: description
options.description: The new description for the stream

options.name: isPrivate
options.description: Whether the stream is a private stream

options.name: historyPublicToSubscribers
options.description: Whether the streams message history should be available to newly subscribed members, or users can only access messages they actually received while subscribed to the stream

options.name: newName
options.description: The new name for the stream

options.name: streamPostPolicy
options.description: Policy for which users can post messages to the stream
Any user can post
Only administrators can post
Only new members can post

properties.description: ID of stream to delete

properties.name: email
properties.description: The email address of the new user

properties.description: The full name of the new user

properties.name: password
properties.description: The password of the new user

properties.description: The short name of the new user. Not user-visible.

properties.description: The ID of user to get

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: Whether the client supports computing gravatars URLs. If enabled, avatar_url will be included in the response only if there is a Zulip avatar, and will be null for users who are using gravatar as their avatar.

options.name: clientGravatar
options.description: Whether the client supports computing gravatars URLs. If enabled, avatar_url will be included in the response only if there is a Zulip avatar, and will be null for users who are using gravatar as their avatar.

options.name: includeCustomProfileFields
options.description: Whether the client wants custom profile field data to be included in the response

options.description: Whether the target user is an administrator

options.description: Whether the target user is a guest

options.name: profileData
options.description: A dictionary containing the to be updated custom profile field data for the user

values.name: id

message.name: Send to Stream
message.action: Send a message to a stream

subProperties.name: propagateMode
subProperties.description: Which message(s) should be edited: just the one indicated in message_id, messages in the same topic that had been sent after this one, or all of them

subProperties.name: topic
subProperties.description: The topic of the message. Only required for stream messages.

subProperties.name: isAdmin
subProperties.description: Whether the target user is an administrator

subProperties.name: isGuest
subProperties.description: Whether the target user is a guest

subProperties.name: profileData
subProperties.description: A dictionary containing the to be updated custom profile field data for the user

values.name: id

hints.text: The name of the output binary field to put the file in

notes.name: Notes
notes.description: Optional note to save with the node

notesInFlow.name: Display Note in Flow?
notesInFlow.description: If active, the note above will display in the flow as a subtitle

alwaysOutputData.name: Always Output Data
alwaysOutputData.description: If active, will output a single, empty item when the output would have been empty. Use to prevent the workflow finishing on this node

executeOnce.name: Execute Once
executeOnce.description: If active, the node executes only once, with data from the first item it receives

retryOnFail.name: Retry On Fail
retryOnFail.description: If active, the node tries to execute again when it fails

maxTries.name: Max. Tries
maxTries.description: Number of times to attempt to execute the node before failing the execution

waitBetweenTries.name: Wait Between Tries (ms)
waitBetweenTries.description: How long to wait between each attempt (in milliseconds)

onError.name: On Error
onError.description: Action to take when the node execution fails

options.name: Stop Workflow
options.description: Halt execution and fail workflow

options.name: Continue
options.description: Pass error message as item in regular output

options.name: Continue (using error output)
options.description: Pass item to an extra `error` output

settings.note: Executable nodes have both common and executable settings
